tool_description: Identifies recently sold comparable properties within specified geographic and characteristic parameters for valuation analysis.

subject_property_id.description: Unique identifier of the subject property

min_square_footage.description: Minimum square footage for comparable properties

max_square_footage.description: Maximum square footage for comparable properties

max_results.description: Maximum number of comparables to return (1-50)

error_messages: Invalid search radius: Radius must be between 0.25 and 5.0 miles. Adjust radius_miles parameter.
Invalid date range: sale_date_start must be earlier than sale_date_end. Verify date formats and chronological order.
No comparables found: No properties match the specified criteria. Try expanding search radius, date range, or square footage parameters.
Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid result limit: max_results must be between 1 and 50.
usage: Provide subject property coordinates and ID. Optionally set geographic radius, date range, size constraints, and result limits. Returns list of comparable sales with property details and sale information.

total_found.description: Total number of comparable properties found

comparable_ids.description: Array of property identifiers for found comparables

sale_prices.description: Sale prices corresponding to each comparable property

sale_dates.description: Sale dates for each comparable property

distances.description: Distance in miles from subject property to each comparable
